description: This Dart source file defines the application's color scheme and theme data for a Flutter app. It includes color constants and a function to build a comprehensive theme with styled UI components such as app bars, cards, input fields, texts, navigation bars, buttons, and chips, tailored for a professional and minimalistic design.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class containing static color constants used throughout the theme.

methods.name: buildOceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns a ThemeData object configured with specific styling to create a professional, minimalistic app theme.
